description:
Their Berrino Vest for men is a functional all-rounder for days of ski touring enjoyment when less is more.

With its ribbed inner structure, Tasmanian merino wool ensures excellent insulation and feels pleasant on the skin. On the outside, the lightweight softshell vest offers scuff resistance and protection against wind and weather. Its elastic two-way stretch material adapts to your every move.

High-quality details such as elasticated cuffs, bonded seam and two-layer collar lend the lightweight softshell vest a clean, puristic look.

The Berrino Vest for men is thus a reliable all-rounder for pure ski touring enjoyment.
name: Ortovox Berrino Vest - Mens
